# hw05

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of hw05 is to practice R package building

## Installation

You can install the released version of hw05 from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("hw05")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("QMSS-G5072-2019/Wang_Hejing-")
```
